frontmatter.title: Documentation of the "ReInHerit Museum Management" Game

node.excerpt: A game design document (GDD) is a software design document that serves as a blueprint from which a game is to be built. It helps define the scope of the game and sets the general direction for the project, keeping the entire team on the same page…
